About Us

Diamond Berry Enterprises

Nested in the heart of Bulawayo Zimbabwe, we are an ultra-modern, creative, business development company that provides suited marketing and business solutions for companies & brands. Since 2017 we have built a close relationship with local and regional brands looking for different kind of answers to all kinds of challenges.

Made up of a team that eats together, plays together, brainstorms together. Immersed with talents from every discipline, working side by side, not just under one roof. Sometimes it gets strident but we like it that way.

We are also proud of our home brewed reputation we accumulated from the past as innovators, disruptors, trailblazers with cutting edge creative and outside the box thinking capabilities.

At Diamond Berry we create concepts and ideas that are hard to ignore, difficult to forget, easily more attractive.

We believe GREAT IDEAS MOVE PEOPLE and in a changing world brand momentum is everything.

RESULTS OBSESSED

CREATIVELY LED

INSIGHT DRIVEN

PROCESS ORIENTED

Services

At Diamond Berry we collaborate, we innovate, we deliver SMART SOLUTIONS making the complex simple.

Great work doesn’t just “happen” it’s born out of inspiration, trust and collaboration. We are renowned for our readiness to explore, to break, to experiment and then put it all together. Doing this sets the bar for a direction that is blindly crystal clear and most importantly applicable to you.

Its all about intelligence. We create campaigns that connect brands to people and people to brands at a deeper level.

Other services include

  • Customer Experience and Design
  • Digital Product Management
  • Capacity building for SMMEs
  • Research and Development
  • Market Linkages
  • End-to-end Business Solutions
  • Website Design and Development
